example.text: Last month, [[user]] voted for the Default on America Act which CUTS funding for US Border Patrol personnel at the border. Now, it's even more important that we give [[user]] the resources it needs to process the increase in asylum cases it will soon face with Title 42 lifted.

[[user]] is right. We have to stop the mass shootings that have become regular occurrences in our nation. Passing my bipartisan Prevent Family Fire Act would help reduce gun violence by incentivizing the sale of safe storage devices for firearms. [[url]]

[[user]] is right. We have to stop the mass shootings that have become regular occurrences in our nation. Passing my bipartisan Prevent Family Fire Act would help reduce gun violence by incentivizing the sale of safe storage devices for firearms. [[url]]

Thank you Mayor Duncan for inviting me to speak at the State of the City. San Clemente remains a vibrant, safe, and beautiful place to live. I will continue to fight for federal resources for the city, including to stabilize the bluffs and address coastal erosion. [[url]]

Over 500 rockets have been fired in recent days from Gaza at Israeli civilians. I support our ally Israel and its right to defend itself. I’ll continue to vote in Congress in support of Iron Dome, which is saving lives. We must now work towards de-escalation.
